metadata.title: Perform wkNN-based label transfer to HNOCA cells with regional constraints

params.note: wkNN-based label transfer applied to non-telencephalic NPCs and neurons in HNOCA using regional constraints: diencephalon, hypothalamus, thalamus, midbrain, midbrain dorsal, midbrain ventral, hindbrain, cerebellum, pons, medulla. NTT labels from reference27 used. Transfer restricted to non-telencephalic regions only.
